Yoga.desc: Look up different Yoga positions and do them for given time

Stretchs.desc: Look up different Yoga positions and do them for given time

Water.desc: Just drink the average glass size at your house. (A liter is the perfect amount to drink each hour.)

Walk.desc: Take a walk outside, preferably in nature. And write in a journal 2 beautiful things.

Meditate.desc: Turn off music, minimum sound, and focus on your breath.
